IExtn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) +f-5 W 6, #r2r-10, ETGT; 7 forft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn 25.10.2012 POLCY MATERS-ADMINISIRAIIONIFNANCE (25/2012) (Decision taken on File NoNHAILL1021/01/2009-Admn(4O) (PLll Sub: Appointment of Site Engineers/ Site Supervisors: In partial modification of Policy Circular-Admin/Finance No: 19/2007 dated 28.1 1,2007 and No. Admin/Finance No.79/2012 dated 04.05.2012 on the above mentioned subject, it has been decided that henceforth the appointment of Site Engineers/Site Supervisors will be approved by the Member in-charge of the State; after following the procedure prescribed in the ibid Policy Circulars. The contract of Site Engineer/Site Supervisor will be extended by the concerned Member subject to requirement with recommendations of the concerned Regional Officer/CGM(T): 2 This issues with the approval of Chairman: 2s7 (V.K Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord /LA) To, Allotficers and employees ot HQIZO[ROsIPIUs[CMUs/Site Olices NHAL
